description: If you're looking for Chicago's finest stick-to-your-ribs meal on the move, then have we got the perfect truck for you. Fatboy is dishing out the most delicious, authentic Memphis-style BBQ you can find north of Tennessee. While this truck may be new to the streets, Chef Stephen brings 7 years experience to the art of BBQ, even grilling the competition at local cook-offs, and can now finally serve the famous food that literally can’t be beat. With a succulent selection hardwood-smoked meat, along with all the signature homemade sauces and sides...boy oh boy, Fatboy is surely bringin’ beautiful joy to Chicago foodies.
name: Fat Boy BBQ
